title: This website
shortDescription: You're here, portfolio website created with Next.js. (That's Galadriela)
description: I created the first version of this website with React and Express.js. However I didn't like having to host such a small and insignificant backend just to send myself some emails through contact form.
That's why I have rewritten it using Next.js. Now I am hosting it in one place and can access backend code through Next's amazing feature: API routes.
Another partial rewrite, this time I switched from Next's /pages router to /app router and from Emotion to Panda-CSS.

title: WIP: Lunar Bingo
shortDescription: A fullstack TypeScript app! Users can create bingos, share them with others and play together! App is almost complete, I just need to work a little bit more on styling before publishing it.
description: My friend Oanh is currently helping me with styling the website. I'll publish the app once we finish.
I had lots of fun learning Vue and creating this website using it. It was nice to take a little breather from constant working with React.

title: Lunarify - React
shortDescription: This is a React app which utilizes Spotify API to show user's top listened-to artists and albums.

title: Lunarify - React Native
shortDescription: This is a React Native version of my Lunarify web app for Android and iOS.
description: Once I heard about React Native I knew I had to learn it. Creating both web and mobile apps using almost the same code base sounded amazing.
And so I did, this is the only app I created with React Native so far, and I did not publish it due to Spotify's rigoristic rules for extending quota usage of their API.
I hope I'll have opportunities to work with this technology professionally.

title: Lunarstars
shortDescription: This is a simple website which generates random pixel art images of stars and planets which you can use for your TTRPG campaign or anything else you want.
description: This is the first app I created with React. I was really excited to show it off. Unfortunately a couple of days after finishing it, the API I used for generating pictures went down.

title: WIP: Minos
shortDescription: ANV Production's project in which I am responsible for coding for Arduino and Raspberry Pi devices using C++ and Python. We are developing hardware and software for an IRL game based on Twine.

title: AMO
shortDescription: An Unreal Engine 5 project I worked on as a developer while working at Nyx VX.
description: Working on this project was amazing. I never actually thought I would like game development but this opportunity at Nyx changed my mind.
I learned tons of useful skills while creating this app, optimization techniques among them.

title: WIP: Time Finder
shortDescription: DiscordJS bot which allows you to create polls to choose the best time for you and your discord server friends. React frontend, NodeJS backend, MongoDB and DiscordJS.

title: Lunarroller
shortDescription: This is the first website I ever made. It is written in Html, CSS and Javascript only.
